title: Brit pair grapple on floor and punch each other on Alicante airport shuttle bus
text:

A British man and woman grappled on the floor and punched each other in front of horrified onlookers on an airport shuttle bus.

The pair - believed to be a new couple - broke into a fight at around 10pm on Saturday after landing in Alicante as other passengers shouted 'oi, stop'.

Shocking video footage captured the incident, showing the woman hitting the man sat on the floor.

After the Ryanair passengers broke up the fight, things kicked off minutes later - and the man proceeded to punch her in the head.

Onlookers say the woman repeatedly called the man "such a b * d" while the man is thought to have called the woman a "psycho b***h".

(Image: SWNS)

(Image: SWNS)

Sources suggest the pair were separated but were locked on the shuttle bus outside the terminal while waiting for police to arrive.

The man was reported as getting off the bus as soon as the doors opened, with one source claiming to have seen him sat on a bench in Arrivals.

One stunned eyewitness said the woman told her she and the man were on holiday together to Alicante, Spain - despite being in a "very fresh relationship".

The passenger, who was also on the Ryanair flight from Birmingham, described the brutal fight as "shocking and mortifying".

She admitted that she "found the thing hilarious" and "embarrassing" - adding: "I just thought to myself - 'oh, he we go, typical Brits abroad'.

(Image: SWNS)

(Image: SWNS)

"We think that they had gotten drunk on the flight over to Alicante, and then things had just exploded on the shuttle bus.

"I think they were having a domestic that got so heated it became violent, and that one of them just touched a nerve - I think she lashed out first.

"We have no idea what they'd argued about, but when it kicked off things escalated so quickly we couldn't imagine what had been said.

"At various points, one or the other was sat on top of the other punching them in the head, and people intervened to break it off.

"I mean, they were really going for it - landing proper punches at each other.

(Image: SWNS)

"I do feel bad for some of the passengers who were sat on the shuttle bus, because everyone was tired and wanting to sleep.

"No one really needed to see the pair fight amongst themselves.

"On the other hand, it was really funny - I was tipsy myself, and found it even funnier when I tried to hold my laughter in."
description: WARNING - VIOLENT FOOTAGE: A shocking video shows the man and woman - believed to be a couple - hurling punches at one another in front of horrified onlookers
